description:
Welcome to the world of MoMo. With MoMo you can send money to friends & family, topup airtime, purchase bundles, pay your bills, merchants and much more. 

It's a one-stop shop for everything you need. MoMo makes it easy to keep track of your money. You can use MoMo services to manage your money..

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

Stay on top of your finances by accessing your accounts instantly anywhere, anytime with Bank of Kigali Mobile Banking. 

With Bank of Kigali Mobile Banking, You can:

Quickly check your account balance with one simple swipe

- Log into your account faster with a secure 4-digit Passcode

- Lock or cancel your lost or stolen cards

- Track your spending with monthly account insights

- Schedule Payments

- Mini statement

- Top up your Prepaid Cards

- Fund transfer

- Track credit usage and credit card payment

-  Loan request

And many more. 

You can also use this Bank of Kigali Mobile Banking App to register and open an account as a new customer of the Bank of Kigali PLC.

Equity mobile has revolutionised digital banking. This app gives you complete control of your financial and lifestyle needs. Simply view your balances, pay your bills, buy airtime, send money and so much more, all from one convenient platform. 

With Equity mobile, you will be able to:

Conveniently and securely do your banking
- Open a bank account in an instant
- Create your profile from the comfort of your home at any time
- Have a full view of your accounts, balances and transactions
- Download account statements and transaction receipts
- Lost your card? Block it temporarily

Grow
- Borrow with ease
- View and pay your loan balances

Transact on the go
- Send money 
-- To your own or other Equity accounts
-- To other banks, locally or internationally
-- To mobile money
-- To your prepaid or credit card(s)

- Pay with Equity
-- Pay your bills
-- Buy goods 
-- Pay to an M-PESA till

- Buy airtime
- Save people and businesses to your list of favourites 

Quick and easy access
- Sign-in with fingerprint or facial recognition
- Change the app to your preferred language (we support English, French, Kinyarwanda, Swahili and 中文)

Connect to hundreds of brokers and trade in financial markets using MetaTrader 5 for iPhone and iPad.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

Risk Warning: Our programs may involve real trading with a high risk of losing money rapidly. Most retail investor accounts lose money when trading financial products. You should consider whether you understand how various financial products work and whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing money.

TRADING

• Real-time quotes of financial instruments
• Full set of trade orders, including pending orders
• Depth of Market (Level 2)
• All types of trade execution
• Complete trading history

ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY

• High-performance charts
• Customizable chart color scheme
• Configuring properties of graphical objects and indicators
• Display of four charts in one window available on the MetaTrader 5 for iPad
• Trade levels visualizing the prices of pending order, as well as SL and TP values on the chart
• Information window that displays orders, trading history, emails, news, and logs in MetaTrader 5 iPad
• Sound notifications
• Financial news — dozens of materials daily
• Secure and fast chats with other traders, creation of group chats and channels
• Support for push-notifications from the desktop platform and MQL5.community services

TECHNICAL ANALYSIS

• Interactive real-time price charts with zoom and scroll options
• 30 most popular technical indicators
• 24 analytical objects: lines, channels, geometric shapes, as well as Gann, Fibonacci and Elliott tools
• 9 timeframes: M1, M5, M15, M30, H1, H4, D1, W1 and MN
• 3 types of charts: bars, Japanese candlesticks and broken line

Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

Welcome to Faranga—formerly known as PressPay—your friendly finance companion that puts you in charge of your money! We’ve kept the services you love and introduced even more tools to help you manage your finances effortlessly.

Send Money with Ease
Faranga makes sending money through MTN MoMo and Airtel Money simple and secure. Whether you’re paying a friend, settling a bill, or topping up your account, you can do it all in just a few taps.

Automated Tracking & Insightful Reports
Our built-in finance tracker automatically categorizes your expenses and provides detailed, easy-to-understand reports. No more guesswork! See where your money goes, set savings goals, and stay ahead with smarter budgeting.

Starting in Rwanda, Growing Soon
Currently available in Rwanda, we’ll be expanding to more markets soon. Wherever you are, Faranga helps you handle your money with confidence.

Try Faranga Today
Download Faranga now and discover a simpler, faster way to manage, send, and track your money—all in one place!

Disclaimer:
Faranga is not affiliated, associated, authorized, endorsed by, or in any way officially connected with MTN MoMo or Airtel Money.

Payments and Renewal:
Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage or turn off auto-renew in your Account settings at any time after purchase.

Terms of use:
https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Privacy policy:
https://app.getterms.io/view/sNFoR/privacy/en-us

In a nutshell, we’re where the world charts, chats and trades markets. Over 100 million people use our social network and supercharged supercharts to make better, brighter decisions when they trade. Download our app to access free charts, alerts, advanced watchlists, plus discuss latest trends with other traders and much, much more. Here’s a fuller feature set: 

World-leading charts
A trader’s rite of passage, charts power insight. Millions use ours – for free – to make better decisions in the markets. Our charts work on any device and outperform many desktop trading platforms. You’ll be able to search for stocks, currencies, cryptos, futures, CFDs and more. A wide range of drawing tools (like Gann Fans and Elliott Waves) and technical indicators will also help you analyze price action.

Simple Pine Script for complex tools
From coding to chart analysis, faster than ever before — we crafted our programming language to give you the power to create custom tools. Pine Script is elegantly minimalist, pre-integrated with data, and breaking your analysis limits.

Bar Replay to hit rewind on past insights 
Watch how pricing data unfolded historically. Rewind markets and review at speed and resolution you desire.

Unmissable alerts 
Trading alerts were never this powerful, flexible, and easy to use. Cloud-based, they are available on any device – get notified by email, app, desktop, or webhook when your alerts trigger.

Made to trade 
Trade directly on our charts – trade through top brokers integrated to our platform, or use Paper Trading to practice buying and selling securities without any of the risk.

One app to track them all
Get a comprehensive view of the financial markets with our app: live quotes, news, trends, financial statements, and fundamentals, all in one place at your fingertips – the fastest way to find all the data you need.

Total economics and corporate reports
Access the latest and upcoming economic events, world companies' earnings, and dividends, in one Calendar.

Watchlist what matters
Keep track of all your beloved stocks and currency pairs with our highly-customizable watchlists. Use them to see real-time price updates and be the first to know what’s moving in the markets – wherever you happen to be. 

Data. Data. Data, 
Gain access to real-time market data from exchanges in the US, Europe and Asia. Hundreds of thousands of financial symbols from 100+ exchanges are at your fingertips. Unless you have incredibly niche interests, you’ll find what you’re looking for.

Never trade alone again
Unleash your creativity onto the world markets by being part of the largest social network for traders and investors. With thousands of ideas and minds published daily and ability to customize and share your analysis, start building your following today.

Always at your fingertips
Our secure and reliable cloud-based infrastructure means you’ll always have access to the world of finance, 24/7. No unexpected downtime at a critical trading moment ever again.  

Terms of use: https://www.tradingview.com/policies/
Privacy policy: https://www.tradingview.com/privacy-policy/

Quick, simple and secure to use - WorldRemit is a better way to send money. We help our customers pay for hospital bills and tuition fees as well as sending money internationally with low fees and guaranteed exchange rates.

With WorldRemit your funds can be with family and friends in a matter of minutes.

Key Features & Benefits:

SEND MONEY, FAST
• From more than 50 countries to more than 150 countries worldwide
• Including Nigeria, Ghana, India, Zimbabwe & Pakistan
• Our international partners include M-Pesa, EcoCash, MTN, Metrobank and many more

CONVENIENT
• Your transfer can be received as a bank deposit, cash pickup, mobile money or an airtime top-up
• Save your recipients to your contact list
• Identify and track where your money is at all times

LOW COST
• Guaranteed exchange rates with daily notifications
• Our low-cost fees are displayed upfront
TRANSFER WITH CONFIDENCE
• When your transfer is complete, you and the recipient receive an SMS or email alert
• Our industry-leading technology protects your money
• We’re approved by the FCA and licensed by government regulators around the world
• Our service has received 125,000+ 5-star reviews from happy customers

Need to transfer money abroad? Here’s how it works:

1.        Choose your destination
2.        Confirm the transfer service
3.        Select how much you want to send
4.        Add the recipient
5.        Choose your payment method

Download now and get started. Please note:

Your ability to send money with WorldRemit depends on the country you live in. The app will display available services based on your location. Our app supports the same send and receive countries shown on our website.

For more information, please visit: https://www.worldremit.com/

Want to get in touch with us? Whether you have a question to ask or a problem to solve: https://www.worldremit.com/en/contact-us

Tunzi is your ultimate savings and investment companion, designed to help you achieve your financial goals with ease. Whether you're saving for personal milestones or contributing to group goals, Tunzi makes the process simple, seamless, and rewarding. Using mobile money, you can save and invest towards goals tailored to your lifestyle.
Why Choose Tunzi?
Personal Financial Goals: Set and track individual savings goals, from emergencies to vacations or tuition fees.
Group Financial Goals: Collaborate with friends, family, or colleagues to save towards shared objectives like weddings, projects, or events.
Mobile Money Integration: Enjoy the convenience of saving and investing directly from your mobile money account, no bank account needed.
Smart Guidance:
Tunzi analyzes your mobile money spending habits and provides personalized recommendations on how and when to save. This smart feature ensures you stay on track without disrupting your daily expenses.
Grow Your Money:
Investments made through Tunzi earn competitive interest rates, helping you grow your savings over time. Your funds are securely managed, ensuring your wealth-building journey is safe and effective.
Unique Features:
Saving Challenges: Participate in challenges like the 52-week savings plan to build a habit of consistent saving.
Goal Insights: Receive insights and progress updates to stay motivated and focused on your goals.
Flexible Saving Options: Save at your own pace with daily, weekly, or monthly contributions.
Transparency: Track every transaction and know exactly where your money is and how it’s growing.
Who Is Tunzi For?
Individuals: Build financial security by saving for personal goals like emergencies, home purchases, or school fees.
Groups: Organize collective savings for events, community projects, or group investments.
Professionals: Use Tunzi to manage and grow surplus funds efficiently.
Safe and Secure:
Your savings and investments with Tunzi are protected by industry-standard security measures. Additionally, the app partners with trusted financial institutions to ensure your funds are handled with care.
How It Works:
Sign Up: Register with your mobile number to create an account.
Set Goals: Choose personal or group goals and decide your saving or investing plan.
Contribute: Save or invest through your mobile money account easily and securely.
Track & Earn: Monitor your progress and watch your money grow with attractive interest rates.
Why Wait? Start Saving and Investing Today!
Take control of your financial future with Tunzi. Whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned saver, our tools and features will help you reach your goals faster while building sustainable habits. Download Tunzi now and turn your aspirations into reality.

Gate is committed to providing secure and reliable trading services for Bitcoin, Ethereum, and over4,000 cryptocurrencies. With over 12 years of industry experience and 44 million users, Gate has become the preferred platform for crypto investors worldwide. 

A full-range crypto exchange with everything you want to trade. BTC, ETH, XRP, HBAR, MOODENG, DOGE, ADA, PEPE, SOL, SUI, LINK, DOT, KAS, EOS, CRV, ORDI, TAO, LTC, SHIB, JASMY, ENA, SEI, AVAX, RATS, XLM, FTM, APEPE, XRP5L, POL, RSR, FIL, ALGO, CFX, BCH, ETC, SUNDOG, KAIA, PNUT, BNB, NEAR, MAF, BAN, EML, BIGTIME, TOKEN, VIRTUAL, TIA, SATS, BOME, UNI, OM, and over4,000 more assets.

A full-featured crypto exchange offering all the top products in one place.
• Spot Trading: Supports full-range assets — including newly-listed tokens, margin trading, BRC-20, AI, MEME, RWA, DePin, ETH2.0 staking, ETFs, 5x leveraged ETFs, Layer 2, platform tokens, DeFi, and more.
• Futures:
Perpetuals, delivery contracts and more — covering 100+ markets with 0 maker fees. Enjoy points redemption and various rewards.
• Alpha:
Gate Alpha provides one-click access to all on-chain assets, supporting the widest range of tokens with minute-level listing speed. Earn Alpha points through holding and trading, which can be used to participate in token airdrops, TGE subscriptions, and limited-time events, unlocking additional benefits.
• Web3:
A new Web3 portal through which you can explore Gate Layer, Gate Perp DEX, Gate Fun, Meme Go, Web3 Launchpad, and more, and dive straight into the on-chain world.
• Launchpool:
Stake GT, USDT, ETH, and other major assets to earn new project tokens. Hourly airdrops, low entry, and high yield help you seize new market opportunities easily.
• CandyDrop:
Complete simple tasks like trading, depositing or inviting friends to earn ""candy"" and join lucky draws for new project tokens. Zero barrier and huge rewards.
• HODLer:
Hold just 1 GT to automatically receive airdrops from multiple projects, with no lockups or extra actions required. Simply hold, and earn.
• Launchpad:
Access early-stage, high-quality token launches and share the upside. Strict screening ensures quality, and fair mechanisms protect your participation rights.
• Earn:
Offers a variety of wealth-management products, including Simple Earn, Auto-Invest, Dual Investment, Quant Funds, Crypto Loan, and more. Stake BTC, ETH, and GT to earn higher APR. VIP users enjoy extra benefits.
• Bots:
Supports a full range of trading bots across spot and futures, including Grid Bot, Martingale Bot, Smart Rebalance Bot, Arbitrage Bot, Inter-Exchange Arbitrage Bot, Infinite Grid, Margin Grid, CTA-Expert Bot, Signal Bot, and more.
• Copy Trading:
Gate Copy Trading allows users to instantly replicate the spot and futures trades of professional traders or lead traders, enabling rapid execution of trading strategies with an overall position synchronization rate of up to 99.99%.
• Community:
Stay at the forefront of crypto news and discussions with Gate Community. Explore real-time updates, live streams, and hot-topic chats to catch upcoming events and breaking news.

- First exchange to commit to 100% Proof of Reserves
Gate's reserves cover over 200 digital assets, leveraging Merkle trees and zero-knowledge proof technology to fully secure user funds, with an excess reserve exceeding $11.676 billion.
- Premium experience with 24/7 support
We provide 24/7 customer support, allowing users to contact Gate anytime through support channels for the best service experience. For any inquiries, you can email us at: support@gate.com.

Join Our Community
X: https://x.com/gate_io
Telegram: https://t.me/gate_official_bot/
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/GateioCrypto

The features of this application are:

Check your bank balances of operative , deposit , loan accounts .
Send money  to own, with in ,other and international  bank accounts.
Raise all types of services request from your mobile .
Mobile recharge .
Mobile Money.

Discover the power of trading right in your hands



Get direct access to the world’s top financial markets and trade with industry leading conditions and cutting-edge technology anywhere, anytime. Simple, fast and feature-rich, our award-winning mobile application takes you from insight to action by offering you a fully customized mobile trading experience.

Join the global community of 2.5 million account holders who choose to trade with a trusted, multi-regulated broker!

Data Self-Portrait is a unique application for tracking life data and artistic visualization. By recording daily data such as sleep, consumption, mood and activities, the application transforms the dull numbers into flowing abstract art graphics, allowing you to "see" your life patterns from a new perspective. The minimalist information visualization design style, combined with the colorful data flow effect, enables your personalized data portrait to continuously evolve with each data addition, showcasing your unique life trajectory. It supports data statistics analysis, historical record management and data export functions. All data is stored locally, ensuring the protection of your privacy and security.

Paidwork is full time or additional job for all people, from every country. You can earn money on any device with access to the internet, wherever you are. You will get paid for your spend time and engagement on the platform.

You can choose how you want to earn money – by playing games, completing surveys, typing texts, answering questions, watching video ads, browsing websites, creating accounts, completing offers and shopping online.

By following simple instructions, just in a month you can earn up to £600 – without any additional taxes and charges. However, there is no limit of your earnings – you set your own working hours.

How Paidwork works:
Step 1. Choose one of the four monetization methods (see below).
Step 2. Follow the instructions. E.g. fill out a survey, play a game, answer a question, create an account, watch a video, test a product and much more.
Step 3. After completing the task correctly you will immediately receive funds to your account.

Monetization methods:
1) Playing games
2) Filling out surveys
3) Watching videos
4) Online shopping
5) Microtasks
6) Scanning receipts

How are the funds paid out?
Available withdrawal methods are: Bank transfer and PayPal. The minimum withdrawal amount is £1. You will receive the funds within 1-2 hours.

How long do I have to earn to withdraw funds?
You earn as much as the time and commitment you want to spend. Perform the most paid tasks such as surveys, games, cashback and registrations. Depending on the difficulty of the task, your salary may be higher.

Is there a referral program?
Yes. You can invite anyone to earn money on Paidwork. You will both get £8 for free when the invited person makes their first payout.

Paidwork app is the only place for free games, free money, cash app, savings, working remotely. Get paid real cash money for playing games, filling out surveys, watching videos, completing offers and typing texts. Make more money for inviting friends! Earn cash money rewards by trying free games, apps, & watching short videos. Get paid cash instantly for shopping & save money with the Paidwork app. Real money and free to use app. Choose anything you want and just start earning!

For any questions or comments, feel free to contact us at: feedback@paidwork.com

Budget App is a personal finance app for spending tracking, budget planning and money saving. It will help you reduce expenses, increase savings, and achieve greater financial freedom.
Budget App, the only personal finance app you need: your BUDGET PLANNER, SPENDING TRACKER, and FINANCE TRACKER.
It is free to use, no ads, no privacy peeping.

「MAIN FEATURES」
• Budget Planner – Set budget for categories & sub-categories on a weekly, monthly, or custom basis
• Money Manage – Manage credit, debit, mutual funds, and stock accounts in one place
• Recurring Transactions – Set recurring transactions on a daily, weekly, monthly, or custom basis
• Subscription Manager – Track and manage your subscriptions, find hidden 
• Shared Budgeting – Collaborate with others to track and manage together
• AI Tracking – Smarter tracking with: AI Importing, AI Voice Input & AI Receipt Scan
• Widget App – Record transactions, view stats & charts — right from your widget
• Shortcut Integration - Using shortcut to record transactions with one click
• Budget Calendar – Visualize your day-to-day spending on a calendar view.
• Stats & Charts – Understand your spending patterns with insightful visuals.
• Shared Ledger – Collaborate with others to track and manage shared budget.
• Cloud Sync – Access your data across all your iPhones and iPads seamlessly.
• Export & Import – Export your data as CSV or import from other CSV files.
More features for Budget App is coming~

What people say about Budget App:
"This budget app has completely changed the way I manage my money! The budget planner and expense tracker features are super easy to use. I can finally stick to my monthly budget and see where my money goes each week."
"As someone who struggles with personal finance, this financial manager has been a lifesaver. The spending tracker gives me real-time insights, and the money tracker helps me avoid unnecessary expenses. Highly recommend!"
"I've tried a few budget trackers before, but this one is by far the most intuitive. The monthly budget breakdown is clear, and the expense tracker helps me stay accountable. Great for anyone serious about budgeting."
"Finally, a budget app that does it all! Whether you're looking for a budget planner or a money tracker, this app covers it. It's like having a personal financial manager in your pocket."
"What I love most about this budget tracker is how easy it is to customize. I set up my categories, track my spending, and monitor my progress toward financial goals. The app makes personal finance feel manageable!"

Take control of your finances today—download the ultimate budget tracker app and start building the future you deserve!


You can subscribe or buy out to use all premium features.
* Subscription payments will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of your purchase.

Built by the most trusted team in DeFi, Uniswap Wallet allows you to maintain full custody and control of your assets. Get the power of Uniswap in your pocket.

With Uniswap Wallet, you can easily create a new Ethereum wallet or import an existing wallet. You can store, monitor and access tokens on multiple chains without needing to change or configure networks. You can view NFTs, connect to web3 apps, and more. Uniswap Wallet source code has been audited by security firm Trail of Bits.

One wallet for all your tokens and NFTs

- See all of your tokens across Ethereum, Polygon, Optimism, and Arbitrum without switching between wallets or chains
- View your Ethereum NFTs alongside your tokens
- Send and receive tokens

Explore tokens

- Search for any wallet or token in web3
- Discover top tokens by market cap, price or volume
- Monitor token prices in real time
- Analyze price charts
- View token stats, descriptions and warning labels

A home for your NFTs

- Stay on top of collection floor prices and volume for your NFTs
- Favorite friends’ wallets to stay up to date on their NFT collections

Connect to web3 apps

- Seamlessly connect to top DeFi and NFT apps like Compound and OpenSea with WalletConnect
- Connect with web3 apps on different networks at the same time; use Opensea on Ethereum and Aave on Polygon at the same time

Follow other wallets

- View other wallets to discover new tokens and NFTs
- Favorite tokens and wallet addresses for easy access

Safely send and receive tokens

- Easily send tokens to friends’ wallets
- Avoid common pitfalls with warnings when sending to new wallets

Stay up to date on the go

- Get push notifications when your transactions complete, even if you made them on another app or device

Secure your assets

- Store your recovery phrase in the iPhone secure enclave so it never leaves your device without your permission
- Backup your recovery phrase to iCloud in an encrypted file so you can easily, but securely access it
- Require Face ID to access your wallet or make transactions
- Keep your information private—you don't need to share any personal details to use the app
- Source code audited by security firm Trail of Bits

For help and additional questions, please email support@uniswap.org. For additional product updates, follow @uniswap on X/Twitter.

We're excited to release the official IOS App of Myfxbook.com, the leading social forex community with over 280,000 forex trading accounts connected!

Our iOS app offers the following features:
- A real-time forex calendar with complete event data and notifications.
- A complete view of your forex portfolio including watched accounts.
- Real-time streaming rates for over 60 forex currency pairs and commodities.
- Real-time forex news.
- Lightning fast user interface.
- Live streaming rates for over 60 forex currency pairs and commodities.
- Live Forex charts with technical analysis.
- Live forex news.
- Live price notifications.
- Live community outlook with custom notifications.
- Calculators to help you plan your trades.
- Simple, intuitive and lightning fast user interface.

The app will keep you easily up to date with the forex markets with the help of the following sections:
- Portfolio: the portfolio section will show you your Myfxbook portfolio including a growth chart, quick stats and the current status of the account (trades, orders and history). Don't have a portfolio yet? Then go to our website and register a free account.

- Economic Calendar: be in sync with the markets up to the minute with our live economic calendar covering over 30 different currencies with easily readable data. Each event can be drilled down for an explanation and historic levels.

- Markets: you can view over 60 different currency pairs in truly real time, tick by tick (EURUSD, GBPUSD, USDCAD, USDJPY, AUDUSD and more), including the changes in 9 different time-frames in just one glance. Want to be alerted of a specific price? No problem - just set up an alert and get notified in real time. The markets section shows you forex patterns in real-time in each and every timeframe in one simple screen.

- Forex News: the news section will show you a streaming feed of economic news items streaming in real time from major news providers - you can even view news of specific instruments (for example EUR, USD or Gold).

- Community Outlook: a real-time outlook for different currency pairs as can be seen in the Myfxbook website. Each pair will include the full data such as the amount of open positions, total volume and more. Set up unlimited notifications for different levels (for example if long sentiment is over 50%).

- Calculators: when planning your next trade, use the calculators to calculate an entry price, position size, margin or risk value for a better money management.

- Privacy Policy - https://www.myfxbook.com/privacy
- Terms of Use - https://www.myfxbook.com/terms

Please rate us and provide feedback so we can enhance the Myfxbook app even further - contact us at ios@myfxbook.com.
